name: US Voter Registration and Demographics by State
content:
Description: Data about US registered voters who participated in the 2018 midterm elections. "B" represents a base amount of under 75,000, and too small to calculate for percentages.

[Source](https://www.census.gov/data/tables/time-series/demo/voting-and-registration/p20-583.html)

Columns:

* State (string): what state the voter data is representative of
* Demographic (string): demographic characteristic of a voter or person in a given state, such as Female or Asian alone
* Total population (numerical): amount of people in that given state in thousands
* Total citizen population (numerical): amount of registered citizens in that state in thousands
* Total registered voters (numerical): amount of registered voters in that state in thousands
* Total voted in 2018 elections (numerical): how many people voted in that given state in thousands
* Percent voted (numerical): what percentage of people in a given state voted
* Percent voted (citzen) (numerical): what percentage of citizens in that state voted
